config.stamina.consumption-section.name: Stamina Consumption
config.stamina.consumption-section.descr:
Each of the following tools is able to consume stamina on use.
This mod respects Efficient Tool enchantment, and allows for three modes:
- Vanilla: Stamina gets consumed the same it does in vanilla.
- No Accidents: Stamina does not get consumed on unsuccessful tool uses.
- Never: Stamina does not get consumed on tool use.
config.stamina.axe-consumption.name: Axe
config.stamina.axe-consumption.tooltip: No Accidents will only consume stamina if you successfully hit a tree, or break something.
config.stamina.fishing-rod-consumption.t: No Accidents will only consume stamina if you cast your rod into a fishable tile.
config.stamina.hoe-consumption.name: Hoe
config.stamina.hoe-consumption.tooltip: No Accidents will only consume stamina if you successfully hoe dirt, or break something.
config.stamina.milk-pail-consumption.too: No Accidents will only consume stamina if you successfully milk an animal.
config.stamina.pickaxe-consumption.name: Pickaxe
config.stamina.pickaxe-consumption.toolt: No Accidents will only consume stamina if you successfully hit something breakable.
config.stamina.shears-consumption.name: Shears
config.stamina.shears-consumption.toolti: No Accidents will only consume stamina if you successfully collect wool.
No Accidents will only consume stamina if you successfully water an unwatered tile.
